messages.content: Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The sun is shining today.
Solen skinner i dag.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She runs five miles every morning.
Hun løber fem miles hver morgen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
My favorite color is blue.
Min yndlingsfarve er blå.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are planning a surprise party.
De planlægger en overraskelsesfest.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He plays the guitar very well.
Han spiller guitar meget godt.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
We need to finish this project by Friday.
Vi skal færdiggøre dette projekt inden fredag.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Have you seen that new movie yet?
Har du set den nye film endnu?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She speaks three languages fluently.
Hun taler tre sprog flydende.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The cat always sleeps on the sofa.
Katten sover altid på sofaen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
I love eating pizza with extra cheese.
Jeg elsker at spise pizza med ekstra ost.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He enjoys listening to classical music.
Han nyder at lytte til klassisk musik.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The meeting starts at 9 AM sharp.
Mødet starter præcis kl. 9.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Har du nogle planer for weekenden?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She bought a new dress for the party.
Hun købte en ny kjole til festen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
We should take a walk in the park.
Vi burde tage en tur i parken.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The book you lent me was fascinating.
Bogen, du lånte mig, var fascinerende.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He always forgets his keys at home.
Han glemmer altid sine nøgler derhjemme.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She wants to travel around the world.
Hun vil gerne rejse rundt omkring i verden.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
This restaurant serves delicious food.
Denne restaurant serverer lækker mad.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are painting their house this weekend.
De maler deres hus denne weekend.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Have you ever been to Paris before?
Har du nogensinde været i Paris før?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He needs to finish his homework first.
Han skal først færdiggøre sine lektier.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She is learning how to play the piano.
Hun lærer at spille klaver.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Let's meet at the cafe around 5 PM.
Lad os mødes på cafeen omkring kl. 17.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
I prefer tea over coffee in the morning.
Jeg foretrækker te frem for kaffe om morgenen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He is studying hard for his exams.
Han studerer hårdt til sine eksamener.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The concert was absolutely amazing!
Koncerten var helt fantastisk!
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She needs more time to finish the report.
Hun har brug for mere tid til at færdiggøre rapporten.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They live in a beautiful house by the lake.
De bor i et smukt hus ved søen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Do you know how to swim?
Kan du svømme?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The weather forecast predicts rain tomorrow.
Vejrudsigten forudsiger regn i morgen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He likes to go jogging every evening.
Han kan godt lide at jogge hver aften.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She is allergic to peanuts and shellfish.
Hun er allergisk overfor peanuts og skaldyr.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The museum exhibits ancient artifacts.
Museet udstiller gamle artefakter.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Let's have dinner together tonight.
Lad os spise middag sammen i aften.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He wants to buy a new car next year.
Han vil købe en ny bil næste år.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She was awarded a scholarship for her studies.
Hun blev tildelt et legat til sine studier.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The children are playing in the garden.
Børnene leger i haven.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
I enjoy reading books in my spare time.
Jeg nyder at læse bøger i min fritid.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's been working at the company for 10 years.
Han har arbejdet i virksomheden i 10 år.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She volunteers at the local animal shelter.
Hun arbejder som frivillig på det lokale dyreinternat.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Do you have any siblings?
Har du nogen søskende?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are renovating their kitchen this summer.
De renoverer deres køkken denne sommer.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The movie starts in half an hour.
Filmen starter om en halv time.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She bought fresh flowers for the dining table.
Hun købte friske blomster til spisebordet.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He prefers to take the bus to work.
Han foretrækker at tage bussen på arbejde.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
This jacket is on sale for half price.
Denne jakke er på tilbud til halv pris.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She practices yoga every morning.
Hun praktiserer yoga hver morgen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
We need to clean the garage this weekend.
Vi skal rydde op i garagen denne weekend.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's going to visit his grandparents next week.
Han skal besøge sine bedsteforældre næste uge.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She enjoys watching documentaries about nature.
Hun nyder at se dokumentarfilm om naturen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
The new restaurant opened last month.
Den nye restaurant åbnede sidste måned.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Do you like spicy food?
Kan du lide stærk mad?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He plays soccer with his friends every Sunday.
Han spiller fodbold med sine venner hver søndag.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She needs to buy groceries for the week.
Hun skal købe dagligvarer for ugen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are celebrating their anniversary tonight.
De fejrer deres jubilæum i aften.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Have you read any good books lately?
Har du læst nogle gode bøger på det sidste?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She wants to learn how to bake a cake.
Hun vil gerne lære at bage en kage.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's going to propose to his girlfriend soon.
Han vil snart fri til sin kæreste.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
We should plan a vacation for next summer.
Vi burde planlægge en ferie til næste sommer.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She listens to music while she works.
Hun lytter til musik mens hun arbejder.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Do you know how to ski?
Kan du stå på ski?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's trying to quit smoking this year.
Han forsøger at stoppe med at ryge i år.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She enjoys going for long walks in the park.
Hun nyder at gå lange ture i parken.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are attending a conference next month.
De deltager i en konference næste måned.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Have you seen the latest episode of that TV show?
Har du set den seneste episode af den TV-serie?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She wants to adopt a rescue dog from the shelter.
Hun vil adoptere en redningshund fra internatet.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's learning how to play chess online.
Han lærer at spille skak online.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She needs to book a flight for her business trip.
Hun skal bestille en flyrejse til sin forretningsrejse.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
We should organize a barbecue this weekend.
Vi burde arrangere en grillfest denne weekend.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's planning to start his own business.
Han planlægger at starte sin egen virksomhed.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She enjoys going to the gym after work.
Hun nyder at gå i fitnesscentret efter arbejde.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are redecorating their living room.
De er i gang med at omdekorere deres stue.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Have you tried the new restaurant downtown?
Har du prøvet den nye restaurant i centrum?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She's going to study abroad next semester.
Hun skal studere i udlandet næste semester.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He enjoys watching sports on TV.
Han nyder at se sport i fjernsynet.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They need to buy new furniture for the office.
De skal købe nyt møbler til kontoret.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Do you want to go for a walk in the park?
Vil du med ud at gå en tur i parken?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She's learning how to knit in her spare time.
Hun lærer at strikke i sin fritid.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He's trying to learn how to cook Thai food.
Han prøver at lære at lave thailandsk mad.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
We should try that new cafe downtown.
Vi burde prøve den nye cafe i centrum.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She's planning to take a photography course.
Hun planlægger at tage et fotokursus.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He likes to read the news online every morning.
Han kan godt lide at læse nyheder online hver morgen.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
They are renovating their bathroom next month.
De renoverer deres badeværelse næste måned.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
Have you ever been to a music festival?
Har du nogensinde været til en musikfestival?
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
She wants to learn how to dance salsa.
Hun vil gerne lære at danse salsa.
Translate the English sentence to Danish.
He enjoys going fishing on weekends.
Han nyder at gå ud og fiske i weekenderne.
